name: Mirrors (itch) (r00k, CaolanRadDogDeon)
description:
[Note: 2 gamepads & a friend required to play]

Our entry to the Happy Valenbirthversary GameCraft jam held at DIT Grangegorman on Feb 14th 2015. Defend your city from an attacking fleet and a massive laser by redirecting the laser to destroy the ships. Move your mirrorcraft with the left stick & rotate the mirror with the right. Players will need to co-operate to deal with the attacks effectively.

Chris McHugh - Code

Glen Noctor - Art

Caolan Radford - Art
